html:
2.5.21  3:56 pm   What do you do outside of making music?

      make videos to go with the music, or, make videos for music to go with

2.5.21  3:50 pm   Favorite aesthetic? (in terms of Music)

      switching aesthetics

2.5.21  3:00 pm   opinion about facts?

      False.

2.5.21  2:44 pm   are you a nerd?

      i am e-nerd, that's an electronic nerd

2.5.21  2:40 pm   What describes the Missouri compromise 

      they've compromised with Kansas, on who gets to have a city called Kansas City

2.5.21  2:05 pm   ever noticed how similar "musicians" and "magicians" are?

     yes

     that's wild

2.5.21  1:35 pm   i got into song making, any tips?

      has anything gone wrong so far

2.5.21  12:32 pm   How do you break out and improvise over a song you know really well and the solos are just burned into your soul

      start out by doing something drastic. such as leaving 2 bars empty. or playing only 1 note. or making the entire first 7 bars about sheep. then see what develops

2.5.21  11:31 am   how to come up with a unique and recognizable video style

      due to circumstances

2.5.21  11:16 am   why do your songs hit so different

      could be from some of the tunnels i've gone through

2.5.21  10:37 am   Do you get any inspiration for your music?

      yes

2.5.21  10:27 am   What is your favorite product?

      time

2.5.21  9:11 am   Thoughts on the banjo?

      it's pretty good

2.5.21  8:54 am   If someone here successfully guessed the title of your next song, would you tell us?

     no

       On that note, is the title of your next song "dream supreme"?

     no

2.5.21  8:35 am   do you believe that the ability to be creative is a human right?

      yes

2.5.21  7:37 am   Why are your songs so random

     they are not

     and why do I find it the best thing ever?

     because they are not random

2.5.21  5:55 am   when will darkness cover the earth?

      at night

2.5.21  4:59 am   what should i write about?

      changes

2.5.21  4:43 am   how to not read a non-book

      either you already know or you can't read this

2.5.21  4:00 am   What's a cool thing 

      maybe a shoe horn

2.5.21  3:14 am   is there such a thing as music hypothesis?

     sure

     If so what's it like?

     maybe something like "all good songs are at 123 bpm"

2.5.21  1:43 am   any tips for improvising on the piano? I've played piano for a long time but whenever I try to improvise it just sounds bad. I wanna be able to add jazzy/funky improvisations to some of my songs.

      the good news is you can play anything you want. the bad news is you'll have to decide

2.5.21  12:41 am   thoughts on magic?

      it's almost too convenient

2.4.21  11:22 pm   what would you say is the most important part of writing a song ?

      you

2.4.21  10:24 pm   what does "being a musician" mean to you?

      being an upstanding member of society

2.4.21  9:43 pm   how to be like you? i want to keep a little of the vibe and do my own things. you are the person that says everything about nothing but when you analyze the lyrics, they mean everything. how does it work?

      everything is everything. it seems redundant to say, but this turns out to be important. especially if you're in need of something

2.4.21  8:57 pm   what do you want to say to the teachers who will be teaching about your music in the future

      i wonder who is making music, during that future time, which will be taught by teachers further in the future

2.4.21  7:53 pm   if music was a road where would it go?

      between you and everything else

2.4.21  6:43 pm   is the thing you're working on right now a music video?

      yes

2.4.21  5:36 pm   what was the question that damien maymdien skipped?

      this one

2.4.21  4:16 pm   what inspired you to learn 3d modeling and animation

      common sense really

2.4.21  3:36 pm   does making music still feel like a struggle to you even after all this time?

     it never did

     it does for me even though my stuff is getting better. I think this may be a good thing

2.4.21  2:38 pm   when is 1+4 equaling 7

     if you secretly had 2 extra

      and how is it not?

      if you didn't

2.4.21  1:08 pm   Do you start with melodies or chord progressions or both?

     the lyric/melody and chords are written at exactly the same time. the lyric/melody are usually the driver, with the chords also pasted to it. so all 3 are in the driver's seat together

      I'm having trouble sorta matching them up.

     if they are made at the same time then they have to be matched up. or else they wouldn't get made

      I can write cool chord progressions but melodies get a little weird.

     try starting with the melody, with words on it. Actually, forget that, ..... try this. imagine a scene in your mind. imagine a situation, in life. Any situation. just make something up. then sing something about it, coming up with the words and the melody at the exact same time, according to what it felt like to be in the situation you imagined. Then very quickly after that, you can add chords to what you sang, which i'm sure you know how to do by now

2.4.21  12:15 pm   Are you planning to remake your old videos now that you learned 3d?

      there's many other things i have yet to make for the first time, so i should take care of those first, then maybe circle back for the re-makes

2.4.21  11:44 am   what hill in france did you walk through with the sexy pants?

      none. that's the joy of songwriting. didn't even have to do the thing. sang about it anyway

2.4.21  10:32 am   Do you keep up with modern music to follow the most recent melodic trends?

      i would feel more comfortable in a leadership role

2.4.21  9:04 am   How much meaning is there in your lyrics?

      as much as possible

2.4.21  8:35 am   What did bad thing did you do in I just did a bad thing?

      failed at producing a song too quickly nor too slowly, and accidentally ended up working on it for exactly the right amount of time

2.4.21  7:31 am   What do you recommend doing?

      how about ushering in a new era

2.4.21  6:08 am   how much long take it to make a video?

      should be a regular amount of time

2.4.21  5:56 am   What's the deal with airline food?

      best food. airlines have the best food, to distract you from how high up in the air you are

2.4.21  4:23 am   i have notices that long long journey's video has a lot of jumping and bouncing stuff, is there any reason?

     yes, that's because the song is bouncy. so the video should be bouncy to represent

     or did you just feel bouncy that day?

     no

2.4.21  3:01 am   what do you mean by 'nobody wins today' in here comes the sun?

      this

2.4.21  2:41 am   Opinions expressed in rhyme?

      how about rhymes expressed in opinions

2.4.21  1:12 am   how do i do a good thing?

      do 10 regular things. that is a good thing's favorite hiding place, in a list of 10 things

2.4.21  12:31 am   do you feel like your headspace is commonly in the present, future, or past?

      i like to cross pollinate

2.4.21  12:03 am   I wrote a song and then I wrote another song, and then I wrote a third song that incorporates elements of both. Should I add transitions to make it one big 8 minute song, or leave them as different ones?

      i haven't heard them, but, from the way you described it i would guess that if you put it all together you're gonna want some connecting tissue. a bit of narrative, or video, dialogue, something, a bit of non-song material to help hold things together

2.4.21  12:00 am   4.14.18  9:42 am Is "Here Comes the Sun" this song?

      yes

2.3.21  11:51 pm   is the next video/song in 3d?

      mostly
